profile.name: Sarah Chen
profile.executiveSummary: Results-driven technical recruiter with 8 years of experience building high-performing engineering teams at scale. Specialized in sourcing passive candidates, stakeholder management, and creating exceptional candidate experiences. Known for filling impossible reqs and building talent pipelines that deliver 18 months ahead of need.

evidence.description: Conduct intake meetings with hiring managers to understand true requirements beyond job description
evidence.outcome: Reduced time-to-fill by 40% through better candidate-role matching

evidence.description: Present talent market insights to executive leadership quarterly
evidence.outcome: Influenced 3 major comp adjustments that improved offer acceptance rate from 65% to 89%

evidence.description: Navigate complex offer negotiations balancing candidate expectations and budget constraints
evidence.outcome: 89% offer acceptance rate vs 70% industry average

evidence.description: Analyzed hiring data to identify bottlenecks causing 60-day time-to-fill for senior roles
evidence.outcome: Implemented solutions that reduced senior hiring timeline to 35 days

evidence.description: Read candidate hesitation signals during interviews to surface unspoken concerns
evidence.outcome: Prevented 12 offer declines by addressing concerns proactively

evidence.description: Make rapid assessments of candidate fit during initial screens
evidence.outcome: 92% of candidates submitted to hiring managers advance to final rounds

evidence.description: Convince passive candidates to explore opportunities despite being happily employed
evidence.outcome: 70% of placements come from passive candidate outreach

evidence.description: White-glove candidate experience from first contact through onboarding
evidence.outcome: 4.9/5 candidate satisfaction rating, 85% of placed candidates refer others

evidence.description: Manage 25+ active searches simultaneously across different tech stacks
evidence.outcome: Maintained 98% SLA compliance while increasing requisition load 40%

evidence.description: Orchestrate interview loops involving 6-8 interviewers across multiple time zones
evidence.outcome: Reduced scheduling time from 5 days to 24 hours average

purpose: Connect exceptional talent with opportunities where they can thrive and make impact.
